doctors.name: Dario Repić
doctors.title: Doctor of dental medicine, DMD, Phd, specialist in endodontic and restaurative dentistry
doctors.biography:
Received doctorate from the Faculty of Dental Medicine, University of Zagreb
with the dissertation entitled: Determination of the bone regeneration potential of mouse embryonic stem cells and bone marrow mesenchymal stem cells.
2009-2013
Specialisation in Endodontics and restorative dental medicine
2010 - 2011
Scholarship for the University of Connecticut Health Center, School of Dentistry, USA
2009 -
Senior researcher, Study of Dental Medicine, School of Medicine, University of Split.
2006 - 2015
Private dental clinic, Dr.Dario Repić, DDM, Marina, Trogir
2004 - 2005
Internship, Split-Dalmatia County Health Clinic
1997 - 2004
Graduated with honours from the Faculty of Dental Medicine, University of Zagreb
1993 - 1997
Trogir General Gymnasium secondary school

doctors.name: Slavica Pejda Repić

2013.
Received doctorate from the Faculty of Dental Medicine, University of Zagreb, with the doctoral dissertation entitled
Use of clinical periodontological indices and the bacterial flora of subgingival plaque in conventional and self-ligation braces.

Scholarship, University of Connecticut Health Center, School of Dentistry, USA

Internship, Dental clinic, Zagreb
2000 - 2006
Graduated with honours, Faculty of Dental Medicine, University of Zagreb
1996 - 2000
Sisters of Mercy Women's General Gymnasium secondary school
